description: Miscellaneous Equipment for Stream 2 Video Equipment.

full_summary:
**Supply Arrangement Call-up**
===========================================================

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

The Canadian Special Operations Regiment is seeking proposals for a Supply Arrangement Call-up against W6399-22-CA50 for **Hard Disk Drives** (UNSPSC Code: 43201803).

### Tender Information

| **Parameter** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | CB-848-21449861 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Solicitation Number | W6448-24-C024 |
| Publication Date | January 24, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 8, 2024, 2:00 PM |
| Expected Contract Start Date | February 9, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |

### Notice Requirements

- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements and Regulations

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Special Operations Regiment
- **Contact Name**: Dean Hiscock
- **Contact Email**: dean.hiscock@forces.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone**: (613) 687-5511

### Important Dates and Submission Requirements

Please note that the tender process has expired.  The information provided is for archival purposes.
